name: soul room
description: Soul Room is a new type of "puzzle-solving fantasy adventure" game. Dr. Reynolds invented a machine to spy on the soul. He didn't want to be stolen by a clown. In order to find the clown, Reynolds began to solve mysterious and strange soul rooms.
minimum_requirements: OS:  Processor:  Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics:  DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes:
recommended_requirements: OS:  Processor:  Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics:  DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes:
